unnamed:Visions.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL ALL cards are Ethereal this turn. Exhaust.
unnamed:Visions.NAME: Visions

unnamed:UnnamedDoll.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Temp._HP. ALL characters gain !SV! Ritual. Exhaust.
unnamed:UnnamedDoll.NAME: Unnamed Doll

unnamed:Respite.DESCRIPTION: Draw 1 card. NL Gain !M! Temp._HP. NL Startup: NL Gain !SV! Max HP.
unnamed:Respite.NAME: Respite

unnamed:Cataclysm.DESCRIPTION: Lose !SV! Max HP. Exhaust 20 random cards. Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies !M! times.
unnamed:Cataclysm.NAME: Cataclysm

unnamed:SoulTap.DESCRIPTION: Lose !SV! Max HP. NL Draw !M! cards. NL Gain !M! Strength.
unnamed:SoulTap.NAME: Sould Tap

unnamed:InfinitePower.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. Add !M! random [#EFC851]Powers[] to your hand. They cost 0 this turn. Exhaust.
unnamed:InfinitePower.NAME: Infinite Power
unnamed:InfinitePower.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. Add !M! random Upgraded [#EFC851]Powers[] to your hand. They cost 0 this turn. Exhaust.

unnamed:Reaper.DESCRIPTION: Kill ALL enemies with less than !SV! HP ([#EFC851]*[]). Gain !M! Max HP for each enemy killed. Exhaust.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: This number is affected by Strength 3 times.
unnamed:Reaper.NAME: Reaper
